Name: team_size_limit
Description: The team size must not exceed 9 members

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The project budget must not exceed the planned budget

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 14 days

Name: worker_availability_required
Description: Workers must be available for assignment

Name: blocker_resolution_required
Description: All critical blockers must be resolved before sprint end

Name: feature_priority_threshold
Description: Only features with priority >= 3 can be selected for a sprint

Name: role_assignment_required
Description: Every team must have at least one Scrum Master and one Product Owner

Name: release_plan_status_active
Description: Only active release plans can be part of the roadmap

Name: epic_status_active
Description: Only active epics can be split into user stories

Name: task_type_valid
Description: Tasks must be of type development

Name: stakeholder_influence_limit
Description: Stakeholders with influence level < 3 cannot block features

Name: scrum_board_columns_required
Description: Scrum board must have at least 3 columns

Name: sprint_goal_achievable
Description: Sprint goal achievement status must be >= 70%
